text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Umamusume destined to rise above<n>their peers are said to
have a certain<n>aura—a commanding quality that<n>attracts all
who stand in their<n>presence.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: If anyone has that aura, it must beher.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A slender form that slices the air like<n>butter and long legs
that cover ground<n>with remarkable efficiency. Her gaze<n>
possesses a determined, piercing<n>beauty.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Above all, she exudes an<n>incomparable air of fortitude and<n>
elegance. It's no wonder how she<n>got her nickname.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some time has passed since I began<n>watching her, and
before I know it the<n>sky is already dyed a regal purple.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove seems to be wrapping up<n>her training for the day
when another<n>student approaches her.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove, sorry I kept you waiting! I<n>can get pretty
distracted when I'm<n>running off of the grounds.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Heh, I've come to expect that of you,<n>Suzuka. I figured it
was something like<n>that, so I didn't pay it much mind.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Do you still have the stamina for our<n>partner run?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, no problems there. I'm ready<n>when you are.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that Air Groove and Silence<n>Suzuka I spot? Lookin'
like they're<n>gearin' up for some partner running.<n>This
could be interesting!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Now that's a pair we may be able to<n>learn a thing or two
from.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A crowd quickly forms around the<n>track to watch the duo.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Wow! Suzuka's front running is as<n>magnificent as always.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I don't think Air Groove plans to let<n>her keep that lead,
though.<n>Look—when Suzuka pulls ahead, the<n>fire in Air
Groove's eyes just grows<n>stronger!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Heh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And sure enough, just as Silence<n>Suzuka rounds the final
turn...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Haahh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Hold up—how the hell did she<n>close that distance so
easily?!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That acceleration! She did well to<n>conserve that energy and
use it at the<n>most opportune moment. Suzuka<n>can't catch
up now.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Gasp...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: This one's mine!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
An insatiable desire to win, tempered<n>by acute, level-headed
judgment—not<n>to mention her incredible running<n>ability.
She is dazzling in every way.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The gap between the runners<n>remains open, and Air Groove<n>
crosses the finish ahead of her<n>competition.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Dumbfounded, I find myself watching<n>well after the race,
surrounded by<n>comments from the multiple<n>spectators.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Well heck, that was pretty exciting!<n>Now I feel like
challenging her myself.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I understand the feeling—her racing is<n>top notch. You could
even call it<n>textbook.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
And she's vice president of the<n>student council to boot. I'm
glad that<n>we have someone like her going out<n>of her way
to support us.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Her methods of "support" can be a bit<n>harsh, but I guess
it's helpful to us all<n>the same.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Small wonder all of our darling ponies<n>adore her. She's one
of the ideals I<n>strive for.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
By the way... You, over there. I noticed<n>that you've been
starin' at Air<n>Groove practically this whole time.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you. I don't see anyone else<n>behind you. Can't say
I've seen you<n>around before. You a new trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wait, are you out to scout Air Groove<n>or somethin'?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Aw, well now... I hate to break it to<n>you, but you're a bit late.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove! There you are! I guess<n>this means you were
doing some<n>personal training today too?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yes, that's right. Is there a problem?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
No, but I did want to talk to you about<n>tomorrow.
Something's come up for<n>me, so would you be okay with<n>
delaying our session by a half hour?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hm. But our course reservation has<n>already been
processed, no? In that<n>case, I'll come out and get started<n>
ahead of you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Huh? I thought you might enjoy the<n>little break—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
My debut race is just around the<n>corner. I can't afford to
waste even a<n>single minute.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I take breaks as necessary<n>without needing to be
told. Have I ever<n>not been well enough to train, even<n>
once?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
W-well, no... I don't think so. All right,<n>then please begin
your training as<n>planned.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Haha, never afraid to lay into her<n>trainer, that one. But yeah,
now<n>you've seen them.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
She already has a trainer working<n>with her. I'm sorry you
had to find out<n>like this.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I guess she never did run a tryoutrace, but there's no rule sayin' thatyou have to do that beforegetting scouted.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This must just mean that I wasn't<n>the only trainer who saw
something<n>truly special in Air Groove...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I leave the grounds that evening with<n>an acute sense of
regret.
